name: Space Pirate Amai
description: Old school 2d shooter with crazy music by the indie band 8bit Phantom Galactic! -Challenging retro space shooter -Fight your way through various stages and enemies. -Intense Boss fight! -Master the use of your shield to survive. -Use powerups to upgrade your ship's weapons!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core (TM) i5-4200U CPU @ 1.60ghZ 2.30ghZ (or similar) Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel (R) hd graphic familly Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Realtek High definition
